  All key components (tantalum, tin, tungsten, and gold) are sourced from **conflict-free and ethically audited** supply chains.

- **Eco-Friendly Accessories**  
  Accessories like phone cases and watch bands made from **bio-polymer**, **plant-based leather**, and **recycled ocean plastic**.

title: # Do's &  Don’ts — Velvera Usage Guide
chunks:
Do's & Don’ts — Velvera Usage Guide > Overview > A quick guide to help you get the best out of your Velvera products, while ensuring long-term reliability, safety, and compliance with warranty and privacy policies.

---

Do's & Don’ts — Velvera Usage Guide > Do's > - **Register Your Product**  
  Register your Velvera device on the [Velvera Care App](https://velvera.com/care-app) within 30 days to activate extended warranty benefits.

- **Use Certified Accessories**  
  Always use **Velvera-certified chargers, cables, and cases** to maintain optimal device performance and ensure safety.

- **Update Regularly**  
  Keep your device updated with the latest **VelveraOS releases and security patches** to benefit from new features and critical fixes.

- **Back Up Your Data**  
  Use Velvera Cloud or local backup options to safely store contacts, media, and documents.

- **Clean Responsibly**  
  Clean your device using **microfiber cloths and non-abrasive cleaning agents**. Ensure ports remain dry and lint-free.

- **Use Privacy Features**  
  Explore and customize your **VelveraOS Privacy Dashboard** for complete control over permissions and tracking.

- **Utilize Velvera Trade-in & Recycling**  
  When upgrading, recycle your old device through Velvera’s **TakeBack+** program to earn green credits and reduce e-waste.

- **Contact Authorized Support**  
  Always reach out to **Velvera-authorized service centers** or customer support for diagnostics, repairs, or technical issues.

---

Do's & Don’ts — Velvera Usage Guide > Don’ts > - **Don’t Use Third-Party Fast Chargers**  
  Avoid using non-certified high-wattage chargers. This may **void your warranty** and cause internal damage.

- **Don’t Jailbreak or Root Devices**  
  Modifying VelveraOS disables key security features and **invalidates all warranty and Care+ protection plans**.

- **Don’t Ignore Overheating or Swelling**  
  Discontinue use and **immediately contact support** if you notice battery swelling, overheating, or performance drops.

- **Don’t Install Unverified Apps**  
  Use only trusted sources (Velvera Store, Google Play) to avoid security risks and data compromise.

- **Don’t Expose to Water Beyond Rated Depth**  
  Even with IP68/IP69K ratings, **avoid prolonged water submersion**, especially in salt water or soapy environments.

- **Don’t Disassemble Your Device**  
  DIY repairs or tampering with internals will **void your warranty** and may cause further damage.

- **Don’t Delay Warranty Claims**  
  Initiate warranty claims promptly. Devices showing **signs of neglect or post-damage usage** may be rejected.

- **Don’t Share Your Velvera ID Credentials**  
  Your Velvera ID gives access to cloud services, backups, and AI features — keep it secure and enable 2FA.

Velvera Smartphone Usage Guide > Getting Started > 1. **Unbox Your Device**
   - Carefully remove your new Velvera phone, charging adapter, USB-C cable, SIM ejector tool, and quick start leaflet from the box.

2. **Insert SIM Card**
   - Locate the SIM slot on your device. Use the ejector tool to open the tray and insert a nano SIM card.

3. **Power On**
   - Press and hold the side power button until the Velvera logo appears.

4. **Initial Setup**
   - Follow the on-screen prompts to select language, connect to Wi-Fi, sign in to your Velvera or Google account, and complete essentials like fingerprint or face lock setup (available on most models).

Velvera Smartphone Usage Guide > Charging and Battery Care > - **Fast Charging**: Use the included 65W charger (One series and up) or the provided adapter for your model. Some models support up to 50W wireless charging. 
- **Battery Tips**: For longer lifespan, avoid letting the battery drop below 10% or charging constantly to 100%. 
- **Power Saving**: Enable battery saver mode in VelveraOS settings.

Velvera Smartphone Usage Guide > Understanding Your Model > Flagship Series ― Velvera One / Pro / Ultra > - **Performance**: Top-tier speed with up to 20GB RAM and storage up to 2TB.
- **Display**: Smooth AMOLED or advanced LTPO 2.0 display (up to 144Hz refresh rate).
- **Cameras**: Dual, triple, or quad-lens setups — pro photography modes, periscope zoom (Ultra).

Velvera Audio Series — Usage Guide > Velvera Buds > Getting Started, Controls, Fit & Comfort, Charging Tips, Care > **Getting Started:**  
1. Charge the earbuds using the supplied USB-C cable or place them in the charging case to top up power.  
2. Open the case lid; the buds enter pairing mode automatically the first time.  
3. On your smartphone, enable Bluetooth and select “Velvera Buds” from the devices.

**Controls:**  
- Tap once: Play/Pause music, Answer/End call  
- Tap twice: Skip to next track  
- Long press (1.5s): Activate voice assistant  
- Tap and hold both buds: Turn ANC on/off  
- Remove earbud: Auto-pause audio

**Fit & Comfort:**  
- Try all included ear tips (S/M/L) for a secure fit.  
- Buds are IPX4 rated—safe for workouts and light rain.

**Charging Tips:**  
- 15 minutes charge provides up to 1.5 hours playback.  
- Place both earbuds in case before storing.

**Care:**  
- Wipe earbuds with a dry cloth after use.  
- Avoid submerging in water.

1. Charge in the case via USB-C or a certified Qi wireless charger.  
2. Open lid to auto-pair; follow on-screen prompts for first-time setup.  
3. For manual pairing, hold both buds’ touch panels for 3 seconds.

**Controls:**  
- Tap: Play/Pause  
- Double tap (right): Volume up | Double tap (left): Volume down  
- Long press: Switch ANC/Transparency/Normal mode  
- Tap and hold (2s): Voice assistant activation

**Advanced Features:**  
- Enable “Low Latency Mode” in the Velvera Audio app for seamless gaming/video sync.  
- Memory foam tips support all-day comfort.

**Charging Notes:**

**Maintenance:**
